thread.title: Tracee Ellis Ross Wins Her First-Ever Golden Globe: ‘This Is for All Women of Color and Colorful People’
thread.title_full: Tracee Ellis Ross Wins Her First-Ever Golden Globe: ‘This Is for All Women of Color and Colorful People’

author: Jordan Crucchiola
title: Tracee Ellis Ross Wins Her First-Ever Golden Globe: ‘This Is for All Women of Color and Colorful People’
text: Tracee Ellis Ross unexpectedly took home the Golden Globe for best actress in a TV comedy or musical tonight, an overdue win that was also her first nomination. It’s been 34 years since a woman of color won in this category — Debbie Allen was the last to win, for... More »
